name: Gateway

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
cd Gateway
Gate.EXE  mt32
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the file Gate.EXE
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/Gateway.conf
installer:
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/HDD/Gateway
    file: mkdir
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      cp -avr "$src_path/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR/HDD/Gateway
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      cd Gateway

      Gate.EXE  mt32

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/Gateway.conf
